ModMetaData.name: Combat Realism
ModMetaData.author: NoImageAvailable
ModMetaData.description:
Version: 1.6.8 update by Skyarkhangel, Killface for A15
An extensive overhaul of the game's combat to make it more realistic. Require Community Core Library first!
Font used for swear icons: Potty Mouth BB by Nate Piekos · Blambot · http://www.blambot.com/font_pottymouth.shtml
